TasselPipeline.citation: Romay, M, Wang Y., Casstevens T. (2015) First Annual Tassel Hackathon.

FilterTaxaNames.workflow: Filter Taxa Names. (example: select lines which contains "NC" and capture the selection)

filterAlign.workflow: Filter out mono-morphic sites. (example: Minimum Count: 1, Minimum Frequency: 0.0005, Maximum Frequency: 1.0)

FilterTaxaPropertiesPlugin.workflow: Filter to remove Taxa with low coverage. (example: Min Proportion of Sites Present: 0.9, Min Heterozygous Proportion: 0.0, Max Heterozygous Proportion: 0.05)
